languages.text: {n}Настроение Реты явно улучшается.{/n} "Это, Ваша Светлость, мне даже неловко такое вам предлагать, но там вон в углу мы сложили всякую добычу, в которой сами не понимаем или воспользоваться не можем. Вы там отправьте людей пошуршать, если хотите... вы-то явно больше нас во всем понимаете. Может, найдете что для себя полезное".

traits.locale_text: {n}Настроение Реты явно улучшается.{/n} "Это, ваше благородие, мне даже неловко такое вам предлагать, но там вон в углу мы сложили всякую добычу, в которой сами не понимаем или воспользоватся не можем. Вы там отправьте людей пошуршать, если хотите... вы-то явно больше нас во всем понимаете. Может, найдете что для себя полезное".
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Her mood visibly improves.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it's kind of embarrassing to offer you this, but over in that corner there, we keep things we don't rightly understand or can't really use. You could send some of your people to check it out if you'd like... clearly you know more about this stuff than us. You might find something useful."

Вы там отправьте людей пошуршать, если хотите... вы-то явно больше нас во всем понимаете. Может, найдете что для себя полезное".

languages.text: {n}她的情绪明显变得好了起来。{/n}“老实说，大人，虽然这么说有点尴尬，不过在那边的角落里，我们堆放了很多我们无法理解或无法真正使用的东西。如果您愿意的话，您可以派人去那边看看……很显然，您比我们更了解那些东西，您可能会发现某些有用的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her mood visibly improves.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it's kind of embarrassing to offer you this, but over in that corner there, we keep things we don't rightly understand or can't really use. You could send some of your people to check it out if you'd like... clearly you know more about this stuff than us. You might find something useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的情绪明显变得好了起来。{/n}“老实说，大人，虽然这么说有点尴尬，不过在那边的角落里，我们堆放了很多我们无法理解或无法真正使用的东西。如果您愿意的话，您可以派人去那边看看……很显然，您比我们更了解那些东西，您可能会发现某些有用的东西。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Su humor mejora claramente.{/n} «¿Sabe, mi{mf|lord|lady}? Me da un poco de vergüenza ofrecerle esto, pero en esa esquina de ahí tenemos las cosas que no entendemos del todo o que no nos sirven de nada. Puede enviar a alguien de su tripulación a echarle un vistazo, si quiere... está claro que saben más de esto que nosotros. Tal vez encuentren algo útil».
languages.original_text: {n}Her mood visibly improves.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it's kind of embarrassing to offer you this, but over in that corner there, we keep things we don't rightly understand or can't really use. You could send some of your people to check it out if you'd like... clearly you know more about this stuff than us. You might find something useful."

Puede enviar a alguien de su tripulación a echarle un vistazo, si quiere... está claro que saben más de esto que nosotros. Tal vez encuentren algo útil».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}彼女の気分は目に見えて良くなった。{/n}「実は、陛下、これを申し上げるのはお恥ずかしいのですが、あそこの隅によく理解できないものや実際には使えないものを保管しています。もしよろしければ、あなた様の配下に調べてもらってください…明らかにあなた様は私たちよりもこういった物について詳しいです。何か役立つものが見つかるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Her mood visibly improves.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it's kind of embarrassing to offer you this, but over in that corner there, we keep things we don't rightly understand or can't really use. You could send some of your people to check it out if you'd like... clearly you know more about this stuff than us. You might find something useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の気分は目に見えて良くなった。{/n}「実は、陛下、これを申し上げるのはお恥ずかしいのですが、あそこの隅によく理解できないものや実際には使えないものを保管しています。もしよろしければ、あなた様の配下に調べてもらってください…明らかにあなた様は私たちよりもこういった物について詳しいです。何か役立つものが見つかるかもしれません」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Ihre Laune bessert sich sichtlich.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, dieses Angebot ist ein wenig peinlich, aber in der Ecke dort lagern wir alles, was wir nicht verstehen oder nicht benutzen können. Eure Leute können sich das ja mal ansehen, wenn Ihr möchtet ... Ihr wisst sicher mehr darüber als wir. Vielleicht findet Ihr etwas Nützliches."
languages.original_text: {n}Her mood visibly improves.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it's kind of embarrassing to offer you this, but over in that corner there, we keep things we don't rightly understand or can't really use. You could send some of your people to check it out if you'd like... clearly you know more about this stuff than us. You might find something useful."

Eure Leute können sich das ja mal ansehen, wenn Ihr möchtet ... Ihr wisst sicher mehr darüber als wir. Vielleicht findet Ihr etwas Nützliches."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Son regain de moral est manifeste.{/n} « C'est un peu gênant de vous dire ça, Votre Seigneurie, mais dans ce coin-là, on garde tout un tas de choses qu'on ne comprend pas vraiment ou dont on n'a pas l'utilité. Vous pourriez envoyer quelqu'un de votre équipage pour les examiner... De toute évidence, vous êtes plus {mf|calé|calée} que nous sur le sujet. Vous y trouverez peut-être quelque chose d'utile. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her mood visibly improves.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it's kind of embarrassing to offer you this, but over in that corner there, we keep things we don't rightly understand or can't really use. You could send some of your people to check it out if you'd like... clearly you know more about this stuff than us. You might find something useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son regain de moral est manifeste.{/n} « C'est un peu gênant de vous dire ça, Votre Seigneurie, mais dans ce coin-là, on garde tout un tas de choses qu'on ne comprend pas vraiment ou dont on n'a pas l'utilité. Vous pourriez envoyer quelqu'un de votre équipage pour les examiner... De toute évidence, vous êtes plus {mf|calé|calée} que nous sur le sujet. Vous y trouverez peut-être quelque chose d'utile. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Gözle görülür bir şekilde Reta'nın keyfi yerine geliyor.{/n} "Bir şey diyebilir miyim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Size bunu teklif etmek biraz utanç verici ama şu köşede tam olarak anlamadığımız veya düzgün kullanamayacağımız şeyleri tutuyoruz. İsterseniz adamlarınızı gönderip gözden geçirmelerini söyleyebilirsiniz... Belli ki siz, bize kıyasla bu tarz şeylerden daha iyi anlıyorsunuz. Belki bir işinize yarar."
languages.original_text: {n}Her mood visibly improves.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it's kind of embarrassing to offer you this, but over in that corner there, we keep things we don't rightly understand or can't really use. You could send some of your people to check it out if you'd like... clearly you know more about this stuff than us. You might find something useful."
